ModMetaData.name: More Toughness Genes
ModMetaData.author: alite
ModMetaData.description:
Makes the Delicate gene use numbers instead of a trait, and adds 5 new traits, which change incoming damage by 110%, 105%, 83%, 63%, and 50%.
[url=https://discord.gg/fYP8qkcNDh]Discord link[/url] for those who want an easier way to ask questions, make requests, or just chat. I'll also be posting new releases there.
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/alite/myworkshopfiles/?appid=294100]Easy link to all of my Rimworld mods[/url]
[url=https://github.com/KonradHeinser/MoreToughnessGenes][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url] [url=https://ko-fi.com/alite56114][img]https://i.imgur.com/Utx6OIH.png[/img][/url]
